definition: silk/thread/trace/(cuisine) shreds or julienne strips/CL:條|条[tiao2]/classifier: a thread (of cloud, smoke etc), a bit, an iota, a hint (of sth) etc

sentences.english: Grace is still on the watch for the red- haired boy.
sentences.chinese: 格蕾絲仍在守候着那紅頭髮的男孩。

sentences.english: Dolce & Gabbana sent out a sultry ensemble of suits and lace dresses.
sentences.chinese: 而杜嘉班納產品主打性感套裝和蕾絲裙。

sentences.english: Grace goes to the glass and looks the big fish in the eye.
sentences.chinese: 格蕾絲邊說邊走到玻璃前盯視着這條大魚。

sentences.english: A cream lace throw covered the bed.
sentences.chinese: 奶油色的蕾絲牀罩蓋在牀上。

sentences.english: Tie your lacy underwear around of the base of your guy’s penis.
sentences.chinese: 將你的蕾絲內褲繫到你男朋友小弟弟的下部。

sentences.english: In 6, Holly valance baby, do not wash.
John asked Grace to marry him.
Grace appreciated his help very much.
sentences.chinese: 格蕾絲非常感謝他的幫助。

sentences.english: JAKE and GRACE are lashed to posts at the front entrance to Hometree.
sentences.chinese: 傑克和格蕾絲被綁在家園樹門口的柱子上。

sentences.english: The concrete supports, in subtly varying arced forms, are deliberately delicate and lace-like in appearance.
sentences.chinese: 混凝土基座微妙的弧度變化十分精緻，就像蕾絲裙邊。

sentences.english: Under her lace and glitz, he wore a jockstrap.
sentences.chinese: 在“她”的蕾絲和浮華後面是他的護襠。

sentences.english: Its complicated mixes like chain-mail and lace are very hard to produce and copy.
sentences.chinese: 它那像鎖子甲和蕾絲的混合很難製作和效仿。

sentences.english: This way she doesn't have to leave the house to cheat.
sentences.chinese: 這樣一來，不用出門打掩護，她就能夠搞蕾絲啦。

sentences.english: Ai-ai pill home hollow bats this lace shirt can achieve your dreams Oh.
sentences.chinese: 愛愛丸家的這件蕾絲鏤空蝙蝠衫就能實現你的夢想哦。

definition: ceremonial robe/formal attire (dinner suit, evening gown etc)
